name: The Rocky Mountain Land Library
blurb: Help transform an old cattle ranch in Colorado into a literary “home on the range” for writers, artists, and nature-lovers.

name: Nornennetz auf der LBM 2019
blurb: Das Nornennetz möchte dich auch 2019 an einem Stand auf der LBM begrüßen, an dem wir unsere Bücher & beliebten Boxen präsentieren.

name: Eden Books - Paradise Found
blurb: Eden Books is the only online bookstore dedicated to romance and women's fiction.

name: OlioHouse: An Upstate Getaway for Lifelong Learners
blurb: Great professors, bunk beds, communal meals, movie nights, & dances. We're transforming a home + barn into sleepaway school for adults.

name: AURELIA: QTBIPOC & Southern Specialty Bookstore
blurb: A Black woman-owned specialty bookstore for horror, science fiction & fantasy by QTBIPOC & Southern authors, artists, and poets.

name: Antología: Sumario Literario
blurb: Una caja con contenidos editoriales y elementos para generar nuevas experiencias de lectura.

name: The Climate Journal Project
blurb: A guided journal to help our generation process and conquer environmental anxiety.

name: Never Ending Books Collective
blurb: Save and revitalize the Never Ending Books storefront — a sanctuary for New Haven’s artists, bookworms, and performers.

name: Fantasy Era diventa un magazine!
blurb: Non è una rivista sulla cultura fantasy, è molto di più!

name: Things I Have Loved – A collection (sort of)
blurb: A collection of essays on love, longing and self-worth

name: Fieldmoot
blurb: A gathering to celebrate and cultivate creativity in Christendom.
